data.title: Ancestry of Christopher Reeve
data.text:
compiled by Robert Battle

The following material on the immediate ancestry of Christopher Reeve should not be considered either exhaustive or authoritative, but rather as a first draft.

The contribution of the undersigned is limited to HTML-izing Mr. Battle's report.

Martin Hollick provided additional material for this report.

William Addams Reitwiesner

wargs@wargs.com

Ancestry of Christopher Reeve 1 Christopher Reeve, b. 25 Sep 1952 New York, NY, d. 10 Oct 2004 http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=sriddle&id=I048700 PARENTS 2 Franklin D'Olier Reeve, Ph.D., novelist and professor, b. 1928 PA

m. ... , div. c1956 3 Barbara Pitney Lamb, journalist [m2. Tristam B. Johnson] GRANDPARENTS 4 Richard Henry Reeve, b. 25 Sep 1904 Moorestown, NJ, d. Aug 1986 Tumacacori, Santa Cruz Co., AZ [SSN 061-07-8780, issued NY bef. 1951] [Woodstock 449 ]

m. 11 Nov 1927 5 Anne Conrad D'Olier, b. c1907 NJ [m2. Mahlon Pitney] 6 Horace Rand Lamb, b. 7 Jul 1892 Sandusky, OH, d. 11 Nov 1977 Fairfield Co., CT [WWI - Horace Rand Lamb, 1st Lt., b. 7 Jul 1892 Sandusky OH, 27 Nov 1917 to 2 Oct 1919, residence Provo, UT] [The National Cyclopaedia of American Biography, vol. 60 (1981) (page number cut off copy) ] http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=nbrown1&ampid=I1026

m. 8 Feb 1930 7 Beatrice Louise Pitney, author and photographer (esp. of India), b. 12 May 1904, d. 9 Dec 1997 ( last residence Princeton, Mercer Co., NJ, last benefit to New Canaan, Fairfield Co., CT] [SSN 114-30-4095, issued NY 1955/6] http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=birkita&id=I20031 http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=jpitney&id=I978 GREAT-GRANDPARENTS 8 Augustus Henry Reeve, of Cliveden Hall, Mt. NOTES

20 -- probably the William Dolier, labourer, age 16, from Ireland, to NY (from Galway) 12 May 1860 on the Brazil, apparently part of the following family group:

John Dolier, age 60, farmer Ann Dolier, age 55, wife Jane Dolier, age 22, spinster William Dolier, age 16, labourer

311 -- She was a sister of Elias Boudinot, president of the Continental Congress

550 -- He is said to have "owned the whole township of Pilesgrove"

1094 -- Royal Descent

2472 -- Royal Descent

4956 -- Royal Descent
